prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Francis James Child in the Clifton Waller Barrett Library Accession #7545-a, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains one note, n.y. September 5, Francis James Child to "Miss Bates" asking her to return 8 volumes of Crabbe to the [Harvard] College Library.
